titles.title: Dr. Robert Schuller Gold Medal Act
To award a Congressional Gold Medal to Dr. Robert H. Schuller, Pastor of the Crystal Cathedral.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Domestic and International Monetary Policy, Trade, and Technology.

committee.subcommittee: Domestic and International Monetary Policy, Trade, and Technology
committee.name: House Financial Services

bill.summary: 7/28/2005--Introduced. Dr. Robert Schuller Gold Medal Act - Awards a congressional gold medal to Dr. Robert H. Schuller, pastor of the Crystal Cathedral.
